import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import products from '../products'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { // Check if you get the product console.log(product) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'IN STOCK' : 'OUT OF STOCK'} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
